Title: Directs the department of economic development to conduct a study regarding increasing public access to museums in New York city
Summary: Directs the department of economic development, in conjunction with various departments and offices, to conduct a study regarding increasing public access to museums in New York city; directs a report on such study to be submitted no later than one year after the effective date.
ActClause: AN ACT to direct the department of economic development to conduct a study regarding increasing public access to museums in New York city
